name: ASTROHUNTER (Game Jam)
description:
Description:

You were hired by the Space Hunter Association (S.H.A) to fight against the notorious space terrorist group “The Black Mamba” who try to take over a one notable space station in the milky way, Carl Bright’s Space station, a famous place for housing many laser weapons. Your job is to eliminate the opposing force and liberate the space station. The problem is that the black mamba cut off the oxygen supply to the space station so you have to use your own oxygen tank which depletes every 10 seconds. But don’t worry the space station has plenty oxygen canisters laying around so you will be fine. Get in there and take back the space station!

Premade Assets:

-Player
